mapper.select: -- Integer id, String name, String pingpai, Date baozhiqi, String chandi, Float price, Integer num SELECT G.id,G.name,G.pingpai,G.baozhiqi,G.chandi,G.price,G.num from goods_food G limit ${page},${pagenum};
select P.name from pingpai P where P.id = ${id};
select P.id from pingpai P where P.name = '${pingpai}';
mapper.update: UPDATE goods_food G SET G.num = G.num + ${num} WHERE G.id = ${id};
mapper.select:
SELECT G.id,G.name,G.pingpai,G.baozhiqi,G.chandi,G.price,G.num from goods_food G
where
G.name = '${name}' and
G.pingpai=${pingpai} and
G.baozhiqi= '${date}' and
G.chandi = '${chandi}' and
G.price >= ${price_s} and
G.price < ${price_b} and
G.num >= ${num_s} and
G.num < ${num_b}
limit ${page},${num};
SELECT G.id,G.name,G.pingpai,G.baozhiqi,G.chandi,G.price,G.num from goods_food G where id = ${id};
mapper.delete: UPDATE goods_food set num = num-1 where id = ${id};
